description: Find our most refreshing mint cocktail recipes, such as Simple Mint Julep, Mojitos by the Pitcher, and Coronarita. Get the cocktails with mint recipes here.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 12 Refreshing Cocktail Recipes With Mint By Corey Williams Corey Williams Corey Williams is a food writer for MyRecipes and Allrecipes. She has a decade of journalism experience. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on August 11, 2021 Close Credits: dasegalla There's nothing like a fresh mint cocktail to cool you down on a hot day. The invigorating herb adds a burst of color and flavor to anything it touches, including these wonderfully refreshing drinks. We've got something for everyone in this collection of our best cocktails with mint: From basic mojitos and mint juleps to big-batch recipes for thirsty crowds, you're sure to find something you love. 01 of 13 Blackberry-Mint Julep Margarita View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Here's the cocktail mash-up you never knew you needed: This fruity and flavorful drink is half mint julep, half blackberry margarita. 02 of 13 Simple Mint Julep View Recipe Save Christina You can't go wrong with a classic. A Southern staple that's become synonymous with the Kentucky Derby, the mint julep is as refreshing as it gets. 25 Popular Cocktail Recipes You Just Have to Know if You Love Making Drinks at Home 03 of 13 Frozen Mojito View Recipe Save allrecipes magazine Cool down on a hot day with this blended mint-rum cocktail that starts with frozen limeade concentrate. "Very tasty and much easier to make than the traditional mojito," says reviewer DUBLIN. 04 of 13 Vodka Lemonade with Mint View Recipe Save France C Kick your regular ol' lemonade up a notch with vodka and fresh mint sprigs. Reviewer and Allrecipes Allstar France C says it's important to allow the flavors to meld for a while before serving. 05 of 13 Summertime Mule View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen "Vodka and ginger beer mingle with summery flavors for a crisp and refreshing cocktail to enjoy on hot days," says recipe creator and Allrecipes Allstar Buckwheat Queen. 06 of 13 Coronarita View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole A can of Corona adds fizziness and flavor to this margarita-inspired drink. "They were light, refreshing, and screamed summertime," according to reviewer and Allrecipes Allstar Soup Loving Nicole. 10 Refreshing Beer Cocktails for Summer 07 of 13 Watermelon Refresher View Recipe Save CookingWithShelia Looking for a deliciously boozy way to use up fresh watermelon? You're in luck! This tequila-spiked drink is the perfect summer sipper. 08 of 13 Mojitos by the Pitcher View Recipe Save dasegalla Expecting company? Easily serve a crowd with this big-batch rum cocktail. "So easy and delicious," raves reviewer ceodomerelations. "I doubled the recipe for a neighborhood bbq and [the drinks] were fantastic." 20 Budget-Friendly Cocktails for a Crowd 09 of 13 Grilled Peach Bourbon Smash View Recipe Save Caramelized peaches are muddled with bourbon, grilled lemon, and mint. This "totally smashing summer refreshment" is best enjoyed with a good friend, according to recipe creator Matt Wencl. 10 of 13 Ginger-Peach Smash View Recipe Save Ginger-Peach Smash | Photo by julie tremaine. Make this flavorful cocktail with just four ingredients: fresh mint sprigs, peach nectar, bourbon, and ginger liqueur. 11 of 13 Cranberry Punch View Recipe Save The Gruntled Gourmand This easy cranberry mocktail is alcohol-free, but you can add vodka for a boozy twist. "I made this over the holidays and everyone LOVED it," raves reviewer Michelle Merolla. "We drank every last drop." 12 of 13 Creolo Cocktail View Recipe Save lovestohost This spiced rum cocktail (which is sweetened with agave nectar and garnished with mint) is "a delicious end to a hot fall day," according to reviewer and Allrecipes Allstar lovestohost. 13 of 13 More Inspiration Francine Lizotte Club Foody Check out Our 10 Favorite Ways to Use Fresh Mint. Plus, explore our entire collection of Cocktail Recipes.
